Brought_forward_overwritten: Manually adjusted carryover. Automatic updates disabled.
ManualCarryoverDialog_Intro: You are about to adjust the standard calculated carryover of allowance contingent. Please be aware of the following:
ManualCarryoverDialog_OverrideSettingDes: By manually entering a value, the automatic calculation of allowance carryover based on the global setting for this allowance type will be deactivated for this individual.
ManualCarryoverDialog_SettingCarryoverDe: The value enterered will be the definitive carryover for the selected year.
ManualCarryoverDialog_NoAutomaticAdjustm: Future changes to the previous yearâ€™s allowance records will no longer influence the carryover. Meaning, if the calculated carryover would increase due to subsequent adjustments in allowance, the manually set carryover will remain unaffected.
ManualCarryoverDialog_Confirmation: In order to proceed, please confirm your understanding of the manual adjustment implications by clicking `Confirm`.
